routing.name: Routing
routing.desc: Your units will learn the process of selecting a path.
routing.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the speed of your units by 0.05%.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.desc: Prepare your units to physical confrontations.
closecombat.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the normal attack of your Melee units by 0.05%.

firearms.name: Introduction to pistol rifle & shotgun
firearms.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the normal attack of your Range units by 0.05%.

information.name: Information Procurement
information.desc: Improve the efficience of your attacks and give your more options!
information.feature: UNIQUE : Can remove the fog of war.

sniping.name: Sniper Trains
sniping.desc: Eagles do not fly with pigeons!
sniping.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the normal attack of your Snipers by 0.05%.

coordination.name: Coordination
coordination.desc: By working together your units tend to keep their role as core!
coordination.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase your offensive/defensive power by 0.05%.

chemical.name: Chemical Training
chemical.desc: Use chemicals formulated to inflict death or harm on opponents!
chemical.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the attack of your Mercenaries by 0.05%.

protection.name: Protection
protection.desc: Tired of losing your units? offers them protection.
protection.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the defense of all units by 0.05%.

bomb.name: Bomb Construction
bomb.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the attack of Bazookas by 0.05%.

psychological.name: Psychological Training
psychological.desc: Psychological torture will leave no trace ... at least physicaly.
psychological.feature: UNIQUE : Each level increase the attack and the defense of your Mercenaries by 0.05%.
